summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6175 for the improvement of East 45th Street from Roosevelt Way to 15th Avenue Northeast; by removing existing overhead utility transmission lines and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87043, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
